thread.title: U.S. bans American companies from selling to Chinese phone maker ZTE

title: U.S. bans American companies from selling to Chinese phone maker ZTE
text:
U.S. bans American companies from selling to Chinese phone maker ZTE Monday, April 16, 2018 - 01:57 
The U.S. Department of Commerce is banning American companies from selling components to leading Chinese telecom equipment maker ZTE for seven years. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. Department of Commerce is banning American companies from selling components to leading Chinese telecom equipment maker ZTE for seven years. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
